tool_description: Validates document typography including font family, size, spacing, and formatting compliance with academic standards.

document_path.description: Path to the document file to check

error_messages: File not found: The specified document path does not exist.
Unsupported file format: Only Word documents and PDFs are supported.
Invalid font size: Font size must be between 8 and 72 points.
Invalid line spacing: Line spacing must be between 1.0 and 3.0.
Cannot extract font information: Document format prevents font analysis.
usage: Provide document_path and optionally specify formatting requirements to validate document typography compliance.

font_consistent.description: Whether font usage is consistent throughout

primary_font.description: Most commonly used font in the document

formatting_issues.description: List of font and formatting problems found
